headline.name: Dawid Wijata
headline.title: Fullstack Developer
headline.description: I'm a Fullstack Developer located in Warsaw, Poland. I specialize in developing web applications using Angular & .NET. I'm also interested in frontend architecture and microfrontends concept.

introduction.headline: About me
paragraphs: I'm a Fullstack Developer with 2 years in the industry, specialising in web application development using Angular and .NET. I love implementing solutions that are meaningful and bring income to others. I've already worked in 4 software development projects for automotive and financial companies.

I'm also interested in frontend architecture and microfrontends concept. I spend pretty much time on spreading these ideas among my company's tech team. It also matches with my core values which are: people, constant growth and being open for gaining knowledge.

duties: development and maintenance of stock market management software named eMakler
developing and maintaining a tax calculation software and adjusting it to newest Swiss tax legislations
developing 10+ new features to adjust the Swiss tax law requirements from FY 2023
optimized the loading speed of a project page in the tax calculation software by 80%
cooperating with a team of 5 people, sticking to Agile approach, in order to fulfill the business needs
end-to-end implementation of MyVideo service for 100+ videos supporting the client’s onboarding and internal training processes
implementing unit, integration and behavioral tests, leading to up to 90% code coverage
migrating an API of enterprise application from VBA to REST-based one with ASP.NET
designing a frontend application using micro frontends concept with Single SPA and Angular 12
designing and developing a WPF-based guard application project for company internal code challenge
leading a team of 2 developers during a process of implementation of a WPF-based guard application
analyzing and planning a set of features supporting client’s company complaint management process
